New Records: Jude Bellingham scored a late goal to secure a draw for England.
Ivan Toney converted a penalty on his international debut.
Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored twice for Belgium.
Jude Bellingham scored the winning goal in stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham praised the team's performance and resilience.
Others: The match was an International Friendly, and Belgium had a 12-game unbeaten run under coach Domenico Tedesco.
